org.ipdr
Interface IncomingConnectionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollectorManager
public interface IncomingConnectionHandler

Provides interface for handling of incoming connections. Used by ListeningSocketHandler.

Method Summary

Method Detail

handleIncomingConnection

public boolean handleIncomingConnection(ConnectionDynamic connection)
Attempts handling of an incoming connection

Parameters:
connection - - connection to handle
Returns:
true if the connection is handled, false if it is rejected.

exporterAddressKnown

public ConnectionConfigI exporterAddressKnown(java.net.InetAddress exportersAddress,
                                              ConnectionThread thread)
Tries to relate the exporter's IP to an exsiting exporterHandler

Parameters:
exportersAddress - - address of the exporter
Returns:
true if the exporter's address has a related handler, false otherwise.
